The great outdoors is the ultimate playground for children! ðŸŒ³

As educators, we know that outdoor play is essential for childrenâ€™s development, but sometimes it can feel overwhelming to figure out the why, where, how, and what.

In this webinar with outdoor play specialist Christina Pickles, gain insights to transform outdoor play for young children! Listen in as she inspires you to get your little explorers to discover the wonderland of plants, animals, water, rocks, sand, mud, and more!

Donâ€™t miss out on this opportunity to inspire wonder and ignite the love of nature in your Early Years classroom.

Highlights:

Discover the benefits of outdoor play

Embrace your role as an outdoor play educator

Explore how loose parts can be used in outdoor play

Connect play adventures to curriculum areas

Speaker

Christina Pickles

Outdoor Play Advocate
